channel.title: PNPC Help
channel.description: I am working on a new 614 server and lets just say... I got stuck in the PNPC command. I have tried restarting the server and a few other things. Anyone know how to make a UNPC command for a 614?

item.title: PNPC Help
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

[quote=“demolish1, post:2, topic:390800”]letme see if i got the commands kk@!! this is all i could find for ya

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 30000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }

}[/quote]

Did you rip this off a 317?

Read full topic

item.title: PNPC Help
item.dc:creator: @demolish1 demolish1
item.description:
@demolish1 wrote:

letme see if i got the commands kk@!! this is all i could find for ya

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 30000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }

}

Read full topic
